About the Package ================================ Infrastructure Manager is an application that helps us in easy provisioning of the infrastructure and manages large infrastructure with the help of Terraform. Terraform is an infrastructure as code software by HashiCorp. It allows users to define a datacenter infrastructure in a high-level configuration language, from which it can create an execution plan to build the infrastructure such as OpenStack or in a service provider such as IBM Cloud (formerly Bluemix), AWS, Microsoft Azure, Google Cloud Platform, Oracle Cloud Infrastructure, or VMware vSphere Infrastructure is defined in an HCL Terraform syntax or JSON format. This package provides easy to use the action that can create, delete any infrastructure on any cloud platform.
=Supported versions= Rest-API version : v1
=Setup= * The Agent should be able to access Infrastructure Manager rest API endpoint URL in order to make HTTP requests. * Internet Connection should be available on Agent OS.
=Common Inputs= - IM REST API Endpoint*: Provide the URL of the Infrastructure Manager REST API. E.g. http://localhost:9000/provisioning - Username*: Provide the username for the REST API authentication. E.g. AUTOMIC - Password*: Provide the password for the REST API authentication.
=Actions= Following actions are supported
* Action name: PCK.AUTOMIC_INFRASTRUCTURE_MANAGER.PUB.ACTION.CREATE_INFRASTRUCTURE * Action Description: This action provisions an Infrastructure using the Infrastructure manager.
* Action name: PCK.AUTOMIC_INFRASTRUCTURE_MANAGER.PUB.ACTION.DELETE_INFRASTRUCTURE * Action Description: This action a removes provisioned Infrastructure using the Infrastructure manager.
* Action name: PCK.AUTOMIC_INFRASTRUCTURE_MANAGER.PUB.ACTION.CREATE_INFRASTRUCTURE_PROVIDER * Action Description: This action create Infrastructure provider which will save credentials to provider on which you want to create Infrastructure
* Action name: PCK.AUTOMIC_INFRASTRUCTURE_MANAGER.PUB.ACTION.GET_EXECUTION_LOG * Action Description: This action fetches execution log so that the user can analyze log of the Created Infrastructure Execution.
* Action name: PCK.AUTOMIC_INFRASTRUCTURE_MANAGER.PUB.ACTION.CREATE_REPOSITORY * Action Description: This action creates repository from where it can clone Infrastructure Manager templates.
